::Shadow Wing::

She walked in behind Lunarpine.
"You go first into the CR chamber. I'll go in after you. I can wait."
She smiled at him.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> The two bots carrying Ramhorn reach the CR chambers, Ramulus 
dropping Ramhorn 
> in. He looks at Lunarpine.
> 
> "We have a five day cease-fire with the newcomers," he says, "That 
they'll 
> hopefully honor. We should all get some rest during that time."
> 
> He activates his comm-link, transmitting to all Maximals, "All 
Maximals, we 
> have a five day cease fire with the Newcomers. Don't fire on them 
unless they 
> fire on you first."
